/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -fopenmp -Wall -O3   -shared -Wl,-soname,libfilesystem.so -o lib/libfilesystem.so CMakeFiles/filesystem.dir/src/filesystem/filesystem.o -L/work/sdks/cudaversions/cuda50/samples/lib -L/work/sdks/cudaversions/cuda50/samples/../shared/lib -L/usr/lib/nvidia-current -L/work/sdks/opencv-2.4.2/lib
